title: How to Open an ARF File on PC or Mac

steps.title: Open www.webex.com/play-webex-recording.html in your browser.
steps.content: Open www.webex.com/play-webex-recording.html in your browser. You can download the free Network Recording Player app for your system here, and use it to open ARF files. [1] X Expert Source Garnik Ovsepyan Computer Specialist Expert Interview. 1 July 2021.

steps.title: Click Windows or Mac OSX under the ".
steps.content: Click Windows or Mac OSX under the ". ARF File" heading. This will download the setup file to your computer. If you don't have a default folder for downloads, you'll be prompted to select a download location.

steps.title: Launch the setup file on your computer.
steps.content: Launch the setup file on your computer. Find the setup file you've just downloaded on your computer, and open it to start the installation. If you're on a Mac, open the DMG file you've just downloaded, and double-click the PKG file to start the installer.

steps.title: Follow the steps and click Install in the setup window.
steps.content: Follow the steps and click Install in the setup window. This will install the Network Recording Player app on your computer. Depending on your version, you may need to create a new username or confirm your computer password in a new pop-up.

steps.title: Click Finish or Close to exit the setup.
steps.content: Click Finish or Close to exit the setup. It will close the installation window. You can now use Network Recording Player to view ARF files.

steps.title: Open the Network Recording Player app on your computer.
steps.content: Open the Network Recording Player app on your computer. You can find it on your Start menu on Windows, or on your desktop on a Mac.

steps.title: Click the File tab.
steps.content: Click the File tab. This button is in the upper-left corner of your screen. It will open your file options on a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Open on the File menu.
steps.content: Click Open on the File menu. This will open your file explorer in a new pop-up window and prompt you to select a file to open and view. Alternatively, you can use a keyboard shortcut to open a file. Just press Control + O on Windows or âŒ˜ Command + O on Mac.

steps.title: Select the ARF file you want to view.
steps.content: Select the ARF file you want to view. Find the recording file you want to play, and click on it in the file explorer window to select it.

steps.title: Click the Open button.
steps.content: Click the Open button. This will open and play the ARF recording in the Network Recording Player app.
